Key Match Events: Ramos homered to left (371 feet) in the 2nd inning
Benintendi tied his career high with his 20th homer
Benintendi homered to right center (365 feet), DeLoach scored in the 8th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox stayed at 121 losses going into their season finale
The game was played at Comerica Park in Detroit, Michigan with an attendance of 41,933
Others: Sean Burke pitched two-hit ball over five innings
Andrew Benintendi was 2-4 with 2 RBIs and 2 hits
B. Brieske was 0-1 with 1 ER in 2 IP
